message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair start to the game!
You got lucky last round, now it's time to be fair!
You're right, it's time to be fair, but I'm still not giving up!
You're getting desperate, I can see it!
I'm not desperate, but I'm getting closer to my limit!
You're getting close to the edge, don't fall off!
I'm not going down without a fight! Take it or leave it!
You're really running out of options now!
I'm not giving up yet! This is my final offer!
You're really grasping at straws now!
I'm out of options, you win. Take it all!
